Description:
Detects DNS queries for anonfiles.com, which is an anonymous file upload platform often used for malicious purposes

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DNS Query for Anonfiles.com Domain - DNS Client
Query: sourcetype='windows-dns-client' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '3008' and query_name like '%.anonfiles.com%'
